feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.33
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Flags / Layout / Preview stores to TS by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15281
  • Fix queries when returning nulls by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15290
  • User and websocket stores converted to typescript by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15291
  • Convert portal backups store to TS by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15280
  • Convert portal email store to TS by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15282
  • Convert portal environment store to TS by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15285
  • Bump next from 14.2.15 to 14.2.21 in /examples/nextjs-api-sales by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15301
  • Put FeatureFlags type in packages/types, simplify flag types by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15308
  • Theme / Row actions / Snippers stores converted to typescript. by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15299
  • Typescript hover + navigation stores by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15230
  • Convert portal feature flags store to TS by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15286
  • Convert portal feature store to TS by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15292
  • OpenAPI package installation in readme workflow by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15311
  • Offer option to open Budibase via CLI by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15312
  • Convert role and published store to TS by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15310
  • Fix triggering automations by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15305
  • Convert portal groups store to TS by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15294
  • Convert portal licensing store to TS by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15297
  • Add save button to user screen by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15309

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.32...3.2.33

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.34
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix enrich endpoint in client by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15319
  • Fix issues when fetching view v1 data by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15318

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.33...3.2.34

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.35
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update AWS SDK to V3 by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15215
  • Fix usage calculations by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15322

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.34...3.2.35

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.36...3.2.37
